Company need to pay for package, Company owner can add the (N) Number of Driver and Taxi. Company owner only will get the commission for every Transaction. Expiry Date for the package

Taxi and More - Mobile Taxi booking Solution
All in one platform for taxi booking business

User friendly admin panel to manage
companies,managers, drivers and taxis
Brand your business with personalized apps
Driver sets status as "I Am free" to be visible in the google map search.
Status as "Recess" or "service" makes the taxi invisible in google map search.
Clicks "confirm" button to move towards pick up location.
Picks the passenger and clicks "pick up" to start the journey
A stopwatch option to calculate waiting time in ongoing journey.
Online credit card payment is processed upon completion of the trip
On successful completion of the trip the driver can view feedback and ratings from the particular passenger.
Sign up or login into smartphone to book taxi.
Allow the app to locate Passenger's current position (GPS based)
Confirm pickup address and destination tapping over google map , no matter whether exact address is known or not.
Passenger gets instant results of the nearby taxi available along with taxi and driver details.
Passenger can select the most relevant taxi and click on "book now".
A final confirmation is asked displaying the taxi, driver, distance details and fare charged.
Also takes up thought over a round trip" i.e dropping you back to the place where it picked up.
Passenger gets its confirmation from driver within 60 seconds showed as " booking confirmation"
The Taxi confirmed can be seen approaching towards pickup point in the google map.
Passenger can track ongoing Journey upon google map.
Receipt is mailed to the Passenger instantly
On completion of the trip passenger can post ratings and social share about particular driver and taxi agency.

Summarizes data associated with Companies, Dispatchers,
Drivers ,Taxis , transactions once logged in.

Provides links to control your website settings,
payment gateways and SMTP.
Companies participating to elevate their customer base are maintained here.
Add, edit and set their status location wise.
Dispatchers fixed to keep an eye on every move are enlisted here.
Add, edit and set their status locality wise.
Drivers set to mobilize passengers are registered here.
Add, edit and assign taxis to each drivers suitability.
Taxi to Comfort travel is all set with details here.
Add, edit and highlight features available in each taxi.
Update the referral discount in percentage. Ex:10
